EmailTemplate.name: RE: Donald, MBO can answer your consulting questions (1385152450.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Donald, MBO can answer your consulting questions (1385152450.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Standard Template - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Don, Great to hear from you, I know you had also been working with Nicolette Taylor but never connected, please consider me your point of contact moving forward. I think the next best thing for us to do is schedule a call so that we can go over all of the program details. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. You can learn more about how MBO works by clicking here <http://www.mbopartners.com/how-mbo-works>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Donald Steele [mailto:dg11682@yahoo.com <mailto:dg11682@yahoo.com>] Sent: Friday, November 22, 2013 11:10 AM To: MBO Communications Subject: Re: Donald, MBO can answer your consulting questions Sara, Thank you for reaching out to me. I have been a consultant for the last 10 years and took a few years off to try another career path. At this point, I have decided to go back to consulting and MBO appeals to me due to the benefits offered and the payroll aspect. Can you please tell me what the medical/dental benefit programs are and the associated costs? Best regards, Don Steele On Friday, November 22, 2013 10:21 AM, Sara Conde <info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Donald,Working independently means the freedom to make your own career decisions - and having a guide to help you along the way can make a big difference.In my experience, consultants that are committed to learning more every day tend to be successful. MBO provides independents with resources covering every facet of owning your own solo business. To learn more, check out this story <http://link.mbopartners.com/688NPM52500005x007oAo00> about a self-employed professional who used MBO's educational resources to launch his practice.Have any questions about being self-employed? Just email me to discover how MBO can help prepare you for success as an independent consultant. ___________________________________ Sara Conde Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://link.mbopartners.com/688NPM52500005y007oAo00>If you wish to update your email preferences, click on the following link: Subscription Management <http://link.mbopartners.com/u/688NPM52500005z007oAo00>
